thread.title: Weekend break with event at Albert Hall
thread.title_full: Weekend break with event at Albert Hall - Review of The Park City Grand Plaza Kensington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KendalianK
title: Weekend break with event at Albert Hall
text:
Lovely hotel with friendly and helpful staff, in a quiet location but near to good underground connections. Was about a 10/15 min walk to Albert hall through the lovely streets and Mews's of Kensington so perfect for us.
Room was immaculate, brilliant shower with lots of power.
Very helpful concierge.
